results.title: Glasgow Subway - Inner and Outer Circle Suspended
results.snippet: Due to technical issues, both the Inner and Outer Circle services are currently suspended. No service is running. Engineers are working to resolve the issue. Please use alternative transport.

results.title: Outer Circle - Delays Expected
results.snippet: The Outer Circle is experiencing delays of up to 10 minutes due to a signal failure at Buchanan Street. Inner Circle services are operating normally.

results.title: Bus Service Disruption on Route 44
results.snippet: Route 44 is experiencing delays due to roadworks on Sauchiehall Street.

results.title: Inner Circle Service Restored
results.snippet: Inner Circle services have resumed and are now operating normally following earlier disruption. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.
